item.title: Changelog
item.description: It makes it easier for users and contributors to see the most notable changes that have been made on HotelX product. All notable changes on our platform will be documented on this page. 2018-09-03 Fix Exchange node empty if not CurrencyX (see doc in https://docs.travelgatex.com/hotelx/plugins/converter/) Fix bugs in Quote Internal improvement Search service 2018-08-22 Settings heritage. Guide Plugins filter Fix bugs
